text:
If you right click on a test element (like a controller) and select "open", you
lose your whole test!  How can someone load a single controller or request into
a test plan at a particular location anymore?  "Open" from the top menus can
clear the test plan, and though I don't like it, it makes some sense.  But when
right-clicking on an individual test element, this behavior is very wrong.
creator: mstover1@apache.org
sebb@apache.org
text: We should probably replace right-click Open with Merge

creator: mstover1@apache.org
text:
But does merge try to merge to the top of the test plan, or from the currently
selected node?

Dunno, it may depend on the content of the file being merged.
We should try to ensure that the contents are added at the current location if 
that is possible.

If Merge is considered ambiguous, maybe we need to call it "Add here" or 
similar.

In any case, the current right-click Open behaviour (and probably name) need to 
be replaced...
creator: sebb@apache.org
